Verdesian hereby objects to any additional or different terms that may be contained in any documents, forms, or any other material received from Buyer. All inconsistent or additional terms, modifications or changes purportedly added or made by Buyer are material, are expressly rejected, and do not form a part of the Contract unless Verdesian agrees to such terms as specified herein. No order is binding on Verdesian until accepted by Verdesian and such acceptance is subject to the Terms and Conditions of Sale.
